about_the_game:
The complete and detailed guide to Intruder on the bridge, with pictures and descriptions to solve all parts of the game and unlock all objectives with ease.

The guide is activated by pressing 'g' key at any time in the game.
The interface includes a quick navigation system on the left of the screen divided by chapters.

With this guide, you can:
- Unlock all scenes.
- Unlock all adult images.
- Unlock all adult videos.
- Unlock all side stories.
- Unlock all achievements.
- I nteract with all the characters.
- Get the best results in minigames.

content_descriptors.notes:
Intruder on the bridge
contains explicit and animated consensual sex scenes, in general this game contains adult themes that are not suitable for all ages and all sensibilities, specifically the game contains themes that include nudity, strong language, alcohol and drugs use sex and violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
